translations: v．否认；拒绝承认（与自己有关）；与…断绝关系

sentences.sentence: Andrew now disowns that statement, saying he was depressed when he made it.
sentences.translation: 安德鲁现在否认了那个声明，说那是自己心情沮丧时作的。

sentences.sentence: But whoever disowns me before men, I will disown him before my Father in heaven.
sentences.translation: 凡在人面前不认我的，我在我天上的父面前，也必不认他。
